layout.name: aspeed
layout.title: Speed
layout.tooltip: Alters Kopter's speed. <u>Recommended to keep roughly between 0 and 5.</u>

layout.name: aamplitude
layout.title: Amplitude
layout.tooltip: Adjusts how far Kopter moves, does not work for Stationary, Horizontal and Vertical Continuous settings. <u>Recommended to keep roughly between 0 and 150.</u>
